findings.professionalBio: Per the Qualia Life (Qualia) people page, Dr. Gregory (Greg) Kelly, N.D., serves as Chief Product Officer at Qualia Life Sciences. He is a naturopathic physician, author (including the book 'Shape Shift'), former editor of Alternative Medicine Review, and former instructor in naturopathic education. His work focuses on translational longevity and performance topics — including mitochondrial health, NAD+ biology, cellular senescence/senolytics, nootropics, and clinical nutrition — which he helps translate into product formulations and public education. (Source: Qualia Life people profile)

notes: Company-hosted bio and LinkedIn captured. Detailed credentials and publication counts to be validated in guest_002_background_credentials.
